alert.note: Alert for Blanco; Burnet; Llano (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 23 at 4:42AM CST by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Blanco, southeastern Llano and southwestern Burnet Counties through 530 AM CST... At 441 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Horseshoe Bay, or near Round Mountain, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Burnet, Marble Falls, Kingsland, Round Mountain, Granite Shoals, Horseshoe Bay, Meadowlakes, Highland Haven, Inks Lake State Park, Blowout, Sandy, Longhorn Cavern State Park, Cottonwood Shores, and Sunrise Beach Village. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
